roleset.name: propel projectile

roles.note: Seems doubtful mention of projectile will appear unless the rel is "shooting". Thing shot tends to be understood when it exists.

example.name: metaphorical goal, within LVC
example.text: I believe we-1 have *-1 to take a shot at getting as much done as we can through the court.
example.arg: at getting as much done as we can through the court.

example.name: unmentioned projectiles, literal
example.text: Adam Scott, of Australia, left, celebrates his shot to the 13th green.

roleset.note: Rolest based on verb entry shoot.01, although this verb seemed to be mostly a literal usage, whereas the noun seems to be primarily metaphorical. Corresponds to Vncls throw-17.1-1.

example.name: LVB
example.text: Yea I 'm in the Philly area ... Basically the song would be nothing major just get a couple shots of different scenes with me and my friend rapping
example.arg: of different scenes with me and my friend rapping
